pro.title: Projects
pro.lorem-text: Doots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latinprofessor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites

description.fullstack: A full stack web application that allows users to find, create, and edit lyrics to their favorite songs. Redux is subbed out for GraphQL application due to it's bulkiness and the app's lack of reliance on state. MongoDB is used to try out a nosql database
description.login: A straightforward reusable login component that leverages node and graphql for simple data transfer. Component can be subbed in for future projects
description.airbnb: An airbnb clone that allows registered users to search for lodging using information such lodging type, rooms, location, and price. Hosts create listings for their rental and have sole ability to edit or delete them. Potential guests can direct message owners if they have questions or concerns. React Native version is included.
description.slack: A slack clone that has public channels, private channels, direct user messaging, email invitations,and file sharing. All messaging is instant and updating through redis subscriptions. User registration is verified through email
description.crypto: A simple application made with React Native that displays the price of cryptocurrencies. Could be published on either android or ios platforms.
